A

addShip(Ship) - Method in class battleships.logic.Player
Method adds the parameter Ship to the list of Ships and adds its location information to the map after making sure the Ship is valid.
Ai - Class in battleships.ai
Class generates the coordinates the AI opponent in Battleships will play.
Ai(int) - Constructor for class battleships.ai.Ai
 

B

Battleships - Class in battleships.logic
Class contains the main functionality of the Battleships game.
Battleships(int, int) - Constructor for class battleships.logic.Battleships
 
battleships.ai - package battleships.ai
 
battleships.battleships - package battleships.battleships
 
battleships.logic - package battleships.logic
 
battleships.ui - package battleships.ui
 
buildAllShips(Player, int, int) - Method in class battleships.ai.ShipBuilder
Method initialises the production of several Ship Objects which are eventually placed into the location map of a player.
buildShip(int, int, int, int) - Method in class battleships.ai.ShipBuilder
Method creates a single ship according to parameters and returns it.

C

coordinates() - Method in class battleships.ui.SetShipsGUI
 

D

didCurrentPlayerWin() - Method in class battleships.logic.Battleships
Method checks if the opponent lost.
didItSink() - Method in class battleships.logic.Ship
Method checks if there are more or equal amount of hits on the ship than there are pieces of the ship.
didPlayerLose() - Method in class battleships.logic.Player
Method iterates through players Ships and checks if they have sunk.

F

feedback(Boolean, Ship, int, int) - Method in class battleships.ai.Ai
Method receives the results of latest turn as parameters and updates the class variables accordingly.
feedback(Boolean, Ship, int, int) - Method in class battleships.logic.Person
Method receives the results of latest turn as parameters and updates the class variables accordingly.
feedback(Boolean, Ship, int, int) - Method in class battleships.logic.Player
Method receives the results of latest turn as parameters and updates the class variables accordingly.

G

getEnemyMap() - Method in class battleships.logic.Player
Method returns the array containing all the locations the player has guessed.
getFrame() - Method in class battleships.ui.MainGUI
 
getFrame() - Method in class battleships.ui.SetShipsGUI
 
getLocations() - Method in class battleships.logic.Player
Method returns the array containing the locations of the players fleet.
getPlayer1() - Method in class battleships.logic.Battleships
Method returns player1.
getPlayer2() - Method in class battleships.logic.Battleships
Method returns player2.
getShips() - Method in class battleships.logic.Player
Method returns a list containing the player fleet of Ships.
getShootingCoordinates() - Method in class battleships.ai.Ai
Method randomises the coordinates AI will play from a list of acceptable coordinates.
getSize() - Method in class battleships.logic.Ship
Method returns the size of the Ship.
getXcoordinates() - Method in class battleships.logic.Ship
Method returns the array containing all the x coordinates for the ship sections.
getYcoordinates() - Method in class battleships.logic.Ship
Method returns the array containing all the y coordinates for the ship sections.

N

negateSurroundingAreaAfterSinking(Ship) - Method in class battleships.logic.Player
Method automatically changes the values of squares on enemy map adjacent to a sunken ship to -1.
newShip(Ship) - Method in class battleships.logic.Battleships
Method delivers a new Ship to player1 until player1's fleet is full, then continues to deliver new Ships to player2 until their fleet is full.

P

Person - Class in battleships.logic
Class contains methods tailored for the requirements of a human player.
Person() - Constructor for class battleships.logic.Person
 
play(int, int) - Method in class battleships.logic.Battleships
Method calls the shoot() method of the opponent to shoot at the opponent's fleet.
Player - Class in battleships.logic
Class contains methods for managing the players fleet and status.
Player() - Constructor for class battleships.logic.Player

Class contains the location and size information of a ship and records when players manage to guess the ships location correctly.

shoot(int, int) - Method in class battleships.logic.Player
Method compares the coordinates received as variables to the location map of player's fleet.
